name: Magic Cat needs shrooms
description:
Magic Cat needs Shroom is a 2D pixel jump n run game in which you collect different kinds of mushrooms and bring them back home.

- Collect all min  40 of 50  mushrooms.
- Beware of the red ones, they hurt you.

     

Hopefully you have fun and enjoy this small game I made for my school as a long term project.

Download Instructions:
- Download Zip
- Unpack Zip
- Select exe
- Have fun

Special thanks to my sister (check her out: https://xionsol.itch.io/deep-sea-cruise ) and my friends, who helped me finish this game!
